mapper.select: SELECT a.arrivalSeq ,a.arrivalRegDate ,a.arrivalModDate ,a.arrivalDelNy ,d.productName ,d.productTypeCd ,d.productPrice ,e.memberTypeCd ,e.memberName ,a.arrivalAccount ,f.companyName FROM arrival a LEFT JOIN placingOrder b on b.memberSeqF = a.poSeqF LEFT JOIN poProduct c on c.poProductSeq = b.poSeq LEFT JOIN product d on d.productSeq = a.productSeqF LEFT JOIN member e on e.memberSeq = b.memberSeqF LEFT JOIN company f on f.companySeq = d.companySeqF

SELECT a.arrivalSeq ,a.arrivalRegDate ,a.arrivalModDate ,a.arrivalDelNy ,d.productName ,d.productTypeCd ,d.productPrice ,e.memberTypeCd ,e.memberName ,a.arrivalAccount ,f.companyName FROM arrival a LEFT JOIN placingOrder b on b.memberSeqF = a.poSeqF LEFT JOIN poProduct c on c.poProductSeq = b.poSeq LEFT JOIN product d on d.productSeq = a.productSeqF LEFT JOIN member e on e.memberSeq = b.memberSeqF LEFT JOIN company f on f.companySeq = d.companySeqF WHERE 1=1 AND a.arrivalSeq = #{arrivalSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE arrival set arrivalDelNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND arrivalSeq = #{arrivalSeq}
